浭字的基本解释

浭
gēng
〔浭水〕水名，中国河北省蓟运河的上游。

浭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gēng］
［《廣韻》古行切，平庚，見。］
水名。又名庚水、黎河、还乡河。即今河北省境内蓟运河的上游。

浭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浭； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页624第22
【廣韻】古行切【集韻】居行切，?音庚。水名。【前漢·地理志】浭水，出右北平無終縣。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Xun
gēng
〔浭水〕The name of the water, the upper reaches of the Ji Canal in Hebei Province, China.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gēng］
["Guangyun" Gu Xingqi, Ping Geng, see. ]
Water name. Also known as Gengshui, Li River, and Huixiang River. That is, the upper reaches of the Ji Canal in Hebei Province.

[Siji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　浭; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 624 22
[Guang Yun] Ancient Xingqie [Jiyun] Ju Xingqie,? Yin Geng. Water name. [Former Han·Geography] Shushui, out of Wuzhong County, Beiping.
